title: Reveries of the Dreamking
description: The third in the Wolves of Joy trilogy. In the aftermath of the war between Curia and Emperor, a wounded soldier meets a strange little man and is pulled into a quest beyond his wildest dreams..."Christensen's ability to put his finger on the pulse of everything that is wrong with liberal humanity is a force to be reckoned with."- Counter-Currents"A good storyteller like Christensen is able to spread ideas with fiction, changing our factual future."- Renegade Tribune
author: Paul  Christensen
